object.name: Goomba
object.extra: The most generic npc in video game history!

bool.name: Move when Mario's not around
bool.info: Move when outside the camera's view

bool.name: Drop +10s
bool.info: Add 10 seconds instead of dropping a coin

object.name: Chain Chomp
object.extra: Mario world's second best dog-acting creature.

object.name: Toad
object.extra: An anthropomorphic mushroom from the mushroom kingdom, the loyalest to the princess Peach!

bool.name: Is jumping
bool.info: Determines whether toad is jumping or not

int.name: Star coin id
int.info: ID of the starcoin dropped by toad if told to do so by Object to spawn

bool.name: Has propeller
bool.info: Determines whether toad spawns with a propeller suit or not

object.name: Dandelion
object.extra: A dandelion found in a lot of levels, has different colour options and can spawn powerups

option.name: Colour
option.info: If you select the red option after getting an item it won't blow away

option.name: Object to spawn
option.info: Object to spawn when the dandelion is blown away

option.name: Spawn direction
option.info: Direction for the object to spawn

property.name: Action1
property.info: Action to do during the first scene

property.name: Action2
property.info: Action to do during the second scene

property.name: Action3
property.info: Action to do during the third scene

property.name: Action4
property.info: Action to do during the fourth scene

property.name: Action5
property.info: Action to do during the last scene

property.name: ModelName
property.info: Each object has its own actions

property.name: CameraId
property.info: Determines the camera code to use from CameraParams.byml when it's used in a CameraArea and similar. Unused in everything else.

property.name: ClippingGroupId
property.info: Determines the clipping group

property.name: GenerateParent
property.info: ID of this object's parent, not needed

property.name: AreaParent
property.info: ID of this area's parent, not needed

property.name: LayerName
property.info: Name of the layer where this object's located (Unknown use)

property.name: MultiFileName
property.info: Unknown use

property.name: name
property.info: The name used by the game to recognise this object

property.name: SwitchA
property.info: When you do something it activates the given switch (Some objects use SwitchA to activate, using it like SwitchAppear)

property.name: SwitchB
property.info: When you do something else it activates the given switch

property.name: SwitchKill
property.info: Gets killed on given switch

property.name: SwitchAppear
property.info: Appears on given switch

property.name: SwitchDeadOn
property.info: Activates if this object is killed

property.name: ViewId
property.info: ID of the area where this object will be loaded (with -1 it's loaded all the time)

property.name: l_id
property.info: ID of this object in the level

property.name: pos
property.info: Object's position

property.name: dir
property.info: Object's rotation

property.name: scale
property.info: Object's scale

property.name: Priority
property.info: This area's priority over other areas of the same type, the higher the value the higher in the hierarchy it'll be

property.name: GenerateChildren
property.info: A list of the children objects of this object

property.name: ChildrenArea
property.info: A list of the children of this object

property.name: Rail
property.info: A rail used by this object
